name: 薛人瑋
objective: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction to Green Chemistry
2.　　Green Engineering (Control of Environmental Impact of chemical processes and products)
3.　　Alternative Reaction Media
4.　　Catalysis for Green Chemistry
5.　　Clean Synthesis
6.　　Renewable Resources and Energy Efficiency & Emerging Technologies
7.　　Clean Technology
8.　　Cleaner Production
9.　　Global Environmental Issues
10.　　Waste Minimization, control and monitoring, and Design for the Environment
11.　　Environmental Risk Management
12.　　Energy Management
13.　　Process Design
14.　　Sustainable Development
15.　　Life Cycle Assessment
16.　　Project Cycle Management
17.　　Quality Control of Cleaner Production
18.　　(Final exam)
scorePolicy:
1.　　Homework 30%：Homework must be handed in during class when the date is due.
※ Late homework – HALF GRADE if handed within a week; ZERO GRADE thereafter.
2.　　Mid-term exam 35%.
3.　　Final exam 35%.
